title: Please help me! What is this font?
author: Luzzy

comments.content:
Hello!

You should upload a picture where we can actually read the glyphs.  
Seems to be written "luanvi", in Helvetica Bold or something similar.

I'm pretty sure the 8 is custom-made.

That said, looking for a font with only one glyph is a bit like searching a car's name with only a pic of the front fender.

Good luck.
